description: Details required by Condition 3 (External Facing Finishes and Materials), Condition 5 (Boundary Fences/Gates/Walls), Condition 6 (Construction Management Plan), Condition 8 (Photographic Record of Boundary Wall and Entrance Pillar) and Condition 11 (Landscaping/Tree Planting) of Planning Permission 18/10424/FUL (Erection of a detached two storey 3 bedroom dwelling and demolition of existing 2 garages and replacement with three attached garages.)
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the conditions, as noted above, are fully discharged.

The Borough Environmental Health Officer is satisfied with the submitted remediation strategy. The applicant is advised to submit a Verification Report following completion of all remedial works. The applicant should also submit additional assessments as recommended in the submitted Controlled Waters Detailed Quantitative Risk Assessment ref 10926-HYD-XX-GI-RP-GE-1002.As such, the details submitted for Condition 6 (Contamination- Remediation Strategy) of planning permission 19/01228/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and therefore Condition 6 is hereby approved.

Please submit a copy of a site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red and adjoining land owned by applicant in blue, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.
